Name: Veiled Concealment
Story Background: In an instant of clarity, the mage veiled themselves in a cloak of enigmatic concealment, remaining unseen and protected from the threats that attempted to pierce the veil of their secrets.
Ability: Target creature is unblockable until end of turn. Draw a card.
Appearance Description: A mage casting a spell, enveloping a creature in a shroud of shimmering, translucent energy, rendering it unseen and inscrutable to the eyes of its assailants. The artwork captures the essence of veiled concealment with a blend of cool blues and ethereal veils, concealing the true nature of the spell within a enigmatic aura of mystery.
